post.body: nearly, got my thick wooly jumper but left the cords & burberry coat at home - pretty sure I'm the only one on Twitter here :D
indeed, & all the more so because everyone is so calm and matter-of-fact about it (& GB has his clunking fist over the button)
hope you all have a creatively festive evening :)
love to but not sure I'd be safe on the roads right now - plus going to Royal Ag College tomorrow for their entrepreneurship day
sorry to be missing Xmas Dorkbot - will be in Plymouth that weekend - early Crimbo with the in-laws, at least it'll be over then
woohoo, at least I'll be dry getting home, and the heating should have kicked in so might be warm - passing Derby now
doesn't that give you a warm glowing feel that they put so much value on your work? :( Have they at least paid up front?
go easy on the VC's they're not all that bad ;)
sadly predictable
10,000 if you believe VentureBeat / Apple http://is.gd/ap4U
well it is an unoffical 'beta', figures, hey ho - back to scrolling through tweets every couple of minutes - thanks for trying :)
I could understand it simply not working, it's the load and mock that annoys, even closes properly, just won't do anything useful
apart from the 'X'? :D Something to do with graphics and OS overhead (no glass effect transitions, etc), core is same linux 8.10
that would be leweb3 ? :)
not sure :s seems to load but then sits there - works fine in Ubuntu but the overhead is a bit much for my poor Dell lappy
@t1mmyb thanks, yeah, I've got AIR running (Twhirl uses it also) but for some reason Tweetdeck just sits there mocking me
dropsend? yousendit? etc?
think most of the free email (gmail, hotmail,etc) are good to 10MB - it'll be corporate exchange servers that'll fall over :)
would love to but am working from Plymouth today, Happy Crimbo to all in the Raven
poor you - lucky me! :D
@xxgkbmjozjoz
congratulations!! sounds like a good Christmas for SD
glad you hear you're ok, top Crimbo present! :)
don't know if @digitalmaverick is using twitter in the classroom but he's got some funky stuff going on at his school
sorry to have missed you also, got there a bit late but hung around chatting with folk until they turfed us out
yeah, vodafone fell at that one, at least @vodfoneliveguy did visit Northen Ireland after some prodding :)
glad I'm already nr M4/M5 for the journey South later :)
congratulations! Real world recession busting success in virtual worlds, top stuff
have a £10 voucher so might try the full menu with @samharding some time
@bluerocket @chrissyg food @ blanc v good, on the Crimbo menu (crockets, Pork & chocolate) everything spot on :)
sorry, I'm in Torquay/Plymouth Fri/Sat - how about Monday @ the Media Sandbox launch?
so you coming out to play?
thanks for the heads up, returning to Bristol for the Media Sandbox later from Plymouth so will be passing M4/M5
oooh, you get all the best toys, and just in time for Crimbo! You should start writing reviews, srly
excellent - I can see that getting bookmarked! Used to be a good BBC local site but it went quiet a while back - cheers
@ChrisUnitt Cinderella redux? #twitpanto
no (office doesn't allow speakers) but it's playing in my head! It hurts.
must be the season for it - my sister had her's yesterday :)
ooh, very umm, festive? :)
in the office so on Sainsbury's mix - will have to get more experimental in the New Year though :D
that a few votes for http://www.extractcoffee.co.uk plus they come to UWE's Farmers market - bonus
fantastic - will have to try them out
at the Royal Agricultural College's Inspiring Entrepreneurship conference - more tweed & stout shoes than I've seen for a looong time :)
seems to be a general flu-thing going around - all the best to your good lady
listening to amazing R4 programme on the Nuclear deterrent
sniggering greatly at R4 comedy slot - listen against :D
sniggering greatly at R4 comedy slot - listening again
RT @jstride want to help test Spend Meter? Call 08448801051 - you'll hear a recorded message and we'll log the call in the sytem! - done :)
haz man-flu; may not survive the night; only lemon, honey & whiskey to sustain; pleez send more whiskey, thxbai
talking mobile business models & eating Mince Pies @ Open Coffee Bristol on Park St
I'm at Park St, Bristol, City of Bristol, BS1 5, UK (Park St, Bristol, England BS1 5, GB) - http://bkite.com/02Jw8
Radio 4 has gone quiet - time to head in to Open Coffee Bristol - see you there
up early for Crimbo Open Coffee Bristol - some coffee, some business, some mince pies - perfect start to the day - http://is.gd/9Qiw
Loving all the cool new folks found through @MrTweet http://mrtweet.net?c=7
I'm at Bristol, City of Bristol, UK (Bristol, England, GB) - http://bkite.com/02IQi
deeply disappointed by T-Mobile's network coverage on the train (Bristol TM to York)
good grief you go sick for a couple days and Google redevelop the GReader front end?
back to the spreadsheets, email and biz dev while Eastenders plays on behind me
another orientation session planned across 3 time zones - down twitterscope to do some washing up before making dinner with @samharding
Innovators in the West of England - Media Sandbox agenda just posted, if you're in Bristol next Monday worth popping along http://is.gd/aHYT
half a million US made jobless in Nov - biggest monthly layoff since 1976 - ouch - http://is.gd/aHOY
any 1337 Linux geeks: can I get Tweekdeck on Xubuntu (works on Ubuntu) 8.10 both - I need my groups back :(
Just seem a postie running down the street stuffing letters like billy-o ; getting ready for the Christmas rush or just a nutter?
I'm at Bristol, City of Bristol, UK (Bristol, England, GB) - http://bkite.com/02TVn
awesomely cool photos of snowflakes http://is.gd/aUtl
why can't people add references as they go? grrr - time for lunch & catchup on GReader
back to report reviewing/rewriting
I'm at University of the West of England (UWE) - Frenchay Campus (Coldharbour Ln, Bristol, England BS16 1, GB) - http://bkite.com/02TvX
woohoo time to move next door for more networking & drinks :D hope there's food - already seen @nigellegg
BT trade space - a cross between Yell, google & Yahoo - WTF? Not quite sure what thats about
at the startupslive.co.uk - thiink I might have had one wine too many at WTH Crimbo drinks, not seeing much inspiration :s
I'm at University of the West of England (UWE) - Frenchay Campus (Coldharbour Ln, Bristol, England BS16 1, GB) - http://bkite.com/02SmI
huzzah, report re-written, now to get it cleared and out to the client
I'm at University of the West of England (UWE) - Frenchay Campus (Coldharbour Ln, Bristol, England BS16 1, GB) - http://bkite.com/02VWE
Just upgraded to WP2.7 http://www.jbsh.co.uk/ loving the new look backend
suitably fortified, time to head home to write up meeting with Science City Bristol and crack on with blog posts, biz planning, etc
not sure who's more entranced by the toy car running around the Watershed - the kid or the geeks figuring out where the arduino board fits
contemplating a winter ale @ the Watershed to fortify me for the walk home
anyone in or around the Watershed for a beer?
I'm at The Watershed, 1 Canon's Rd, Bristol, City of Bristol, BS1 5, UK (1 Canon's Rd, Bristol, England BS1 5, GB) - http://bkite.com/0...
freezing cold out, looking forward to lunch - will let you know what the fare is like 51.46 -2.58 http://tinyurl.com/5rvkp3
off to the office Crimbo lunch at Brasserie Blanc in the posh bit of Cabot Circus - then more meetings on innovation & entrepreneurship :)
freezing office not helped by the boilers not switching on this morning, apparently estates are 'sending a man round' :(
dear god, someone's brought a 'singing reindeer' in - that's just inhuman
I'm at University of the West of England (UWE) - Frenchay Campus (Coldharbour Ln, Bristol, England BS16 1, GB) - http://bkite.com/02UFt
someone left a window open in the office overnight - 17C - might go and sit in the loos for a bit, its warmer out there :(
RT @learnit Can you donate digital cameras/expertise? Photo project, help refugees document their lives @wishfish http://tinyurl.com/5qd6qj
just made it to the Media Sandbox lunch in time for the best ideas' feedback :)
I'm at The Watershed, 1 Canon's Rd, Bristol, City of Bristol, BS1 5, UK (1 Canon's Rd, Bristol, England BS1 5, GB) - http://bkite.com/0...
http://twitpic.com/srte - Plymouth City maths fail
David Jason finished Episode 7 of Christmas Carol on R4 - time for bed
I'm at Bristol, City of Bristol, UK (Bristol, England, GB) - http://bkite.com/03aND
out of office set on work email - that's it until 2009
encore, encore #twitpanto
nice ending :D #twitpanto
has to be a joke about broad band in there somewhere #twitpanto
all productivity ceased (and there wasn't much) thanks to #twitpanto
thanks @edmittance @nigellegg for more cool ideas on coffee beans in Bristol
